text: Egha aning 12plan gumazir dapanir kaba ko, Israelia bar me akuvasa men dei. Ezɨ iakɨnir namba 2ɨn, an aruer faragha zuimɨn, Israelia bar uari akuvazɨ, me gumazamizibar ziaba ko men anababa ko men ikɨzibar ziaba ko dɨboboniba osiri. Gumazir 20plan azeniba itiba ko 20plan azenibagh afiraziba, me bar men ziaba vaghvagha da osira me medi.
